sense.name: join letters in a ligature when writing
sense.examples: The letters were ligated, forming the word KITCHEN.

sense.name: chemically bind
sense.examples: Ligate DNA fragments directly into 40 subcloning, expression vectors. The enzyme ligated These DNA fragments can be ligated together but with lower efficiency. An NcoI-NotI fragment was ligated together with XhoI/NcoI digested PCR product. Three DNA fragments were ligated together. These fragments were ligated together into a derivative of pCI.

sense.name: bind with a bandage or a ligature
sense.examples: Varices were ligated with single elastic rings. All blunt ends can be ligated together. The possibility of ligating the ruptured artery could not be entertained. The facial artery may be ligated at this point. All the blood vessels are ligated with black silk. The vein was suture ligated. The vessels were either ligated or cauterized without difficulty.
